comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- your date in brackets below the photo [1912] is incorrect. The negative bears the date 1913.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan,

The [1912] date does appear to be incorrect, and not just because of the date on the negative! Mr. Flanner on the far right is reading a 1913 souvenir score book issued by the Athletics for the World Series, so that further confirms the date.  The full date is likely 10/8/13 despite the 10/9/13 on the negative. Game 2 of the 1913 World Series took place at Shibe Park in Philadelphia on Oct. 8, while Game 3 took place the next day in Brooklyn at the Polo Grounds. 

Thanks for the heads up!
